# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this exceptional opportunity to you. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $18,000.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $18,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer
